html:
2026-0145
2026-02-24FINCustoms TariffSteel Derivative Goods Surtax Remission OrderSteel Derivative Goods Surtax Remission Order in order to provide remission of surtaxes for (i) goods that are imported by or on behalf of the Canadian public health, health care, public safety or national security entities, (ii) utility wind towers and sections of those towers that have a supply order signed before December 26, 2025, and (iii) wind towers imported into Canada for installation in an offshore wind project.Registration: SOR/2026-0034 Publication Date: 2026-03-11
subject: Steel Derivative Goods Surtax Remission Order
precis: Steel Derivative Goods Surtax Remission Order in order to provide remission of surtaxes for (i) goods that are imported by or on behalf of the Canadian public health, health care, public safety or national security entities, (ii) utility wind towers and sections of those towers that have a supply order signed before December 26, 2025, and (iii) wind towers imported into Canada for installation in an offshore wind project.
